heading: HR02248
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE MALACAÑANG TO DISCLOSE TO THE PUBLIC THE TRUE HEALTH STATUS OF THE PRESIDENT IN ORDER TO QUELL PUBLIC UNREST OVER HIS WELL-BEING AND ENSURE THE SAME OF THE FITNESS OF THE PRESIDENT TO EXERCISE HIS DUTIES AS THE LEADER OF THIS NATION
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-11-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02248
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE MALACAÑANG TO DISCLOSE TO THE PUBLIC THE TRUE HEALTH STATUS OF THE PRESIDENT IN ORDER TO QUELL PUBLIC UNREST OVER HIS WELL-BEING AND ENSURE THE SAME OF THE FITNESS OF THE PRESIDENT TO EXERCISE HIS DUTIES AS THE LEADER OF THIS NATION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-11
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-11-12
